Package imagingbook.lib.util.progress

Interface ProgressReporter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BilateralFilterScalar, BilateralFilterScalarSeparable, BilateralFilterVector, BilateralFilterVectorSeparable, ExampleFilterScalar, ExampleFilterVector, FilterShowProgressExample, GaussianFilter, GaussianFilterSeparable, GenericFilter, GenericFilterScalar, GenericFilterScalarSeparable, GenericFilterVector, GenericFilterVectorSeparable, KuwaharaFilterScalar, KuwaharaFilterVector, LinearFilter, LinearFilterSeparable, NagaoMatsuyamaFilterScalar, NagaoMatsuyamaFilterVector, PeronaMalikFilterScalar, PeronaMalikFilterVector, ScalarMedianFilter, TschumperleDericheFilter, VectorMedianFilter, VectorMedianFilterSharpen
    public interface ProgressReporter
    Monitored objects (tasks) must implement this interface. See GenericFilter for an example. See also ProgressMonitor.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double getProgress()
      Returns a value in [0,1) indicating to which degree this task is complete.

    • Method Detail

      • getProgress

        double getProgress()
        Returns a value in [0,1) indicating to which degree this task is complete.
        Returns:
        a value between 0 and 1
